item.title: Building a New Successful Hostel Campaign
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
In the world of traveling, booking and high-quality service it is quite important to promote your hostel/hotel, especially when you are planning to host celebrities or politicians. One good…

The post Building a New Successful Hostel Campaign first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
In the world of traveling, booking and high-quality service it is quite important to promote your hostel/hotel, especially when you are planning to host celebrities or politicians. One good method that guarantees success is to shoot an add. We are here at your service to write the best script and help you implement your ideas at their best rate.

item.title: How Ads May Influence Our Mental Health
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
In today’s global situation, ads play one of the biggest roles in media. Psychologists suggest that we (regular users) allow other people (markets, businesses, traders) make the choice for…

The post How Ads May Influence Our Mental Health first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
In today’s global situation, ads play one of the biggest roles in media. Psychologists suggest that we (regular users) allow other people (markets, businesses, traders) make the choice for us by clicking on their ads, open their websites etc. Bright and shiny advertisements grab our attention with the message, the image and, of course, pricing. Because everything’s cheaper in the ads.

The post Why the Right Contact List is Crucial for Marketers first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
Whether we are talking e-mails, phones or social media, the right list of contacts is highly important for advertising. Brands ofter forget how to use old school methods of marketing, but want to remind a few steps that are crucial to your new business (and for any business, actually). The post Sharing Personal Information while Working Online first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
That is definitely an issue for random users who still hope that they can keep it private while surfing the Internet. item.title: Working Environment Issues and Tips
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
To be able to spend a good amount of time in your office with the same people requires a stable and pleasant working environment, where every employee feels comfortable,…

The post Working Environment Issues and Tips first appeared on zennet.
item.content:encoded:
To be able to spend a good amount of time in your office with the same people requires a stable and pleasant working environment, where every employee feels comfortable, welcome and useful. To create such atmosphere in your office you have to make sure that all members are involved 100%. Commitment and devotion need to be motivated constantly.
